name: Recreation of Dialog Between Emotion and Method | Vera Molnár (1986)
description: Generating a grid of layered, randomized shapes using different colors by repeatedly drawing slightly altered rectangles at varying positions and sizes.

name: Variation of Dialog Between Emotion and Method | Vera Molnár (1986)
description: Continuously updating grid of randomly distorted, multi-layered shapes with pastel colors.

name: Zdenek Sykora Black and White
description: Generating a static pattern of randomly colored triangles. Filling a grid, where each cell is split into two triangles with alternating black and white colors, determined by noise and random values.

name: Zdenek Sykora Black and White - Variation
description: Static, grid-based pattern of multicolored triangles by selecting random colors from a predefined palette.

name: Flow
description: This code generates a complex, evolving visual artwork on a canvas that adapts its appearance through several stages, using noise and randomization to create colorful, flowing lines and a paper-like texture. To create this one I followed a tutorial by Steve's Makerspace.

name: Interactive display experiment
description: An interactive grid of circles on the canvas that dynamically change their size based on the distance from the mouse pointer.

name: Interactive display
description: Explains the what and the why. What is the main idea? What is the purpose? Describes the coding process and implementation choices and gives a high level system overview.

name: Experiment
description: Animation of rectangles that rotate around the center of the canvas, with their size and corner roundness dynamically decreasing as the loop iterates.

name: Experiment with color
description: Animation of rectangles that rotate around the center of the canvas, with slightly changed values. Added color that change dynamically based on sine and cosine functions.

name: Experiment in grid
description: A variation of my experiment presented in a grid for a more dinamic effect.

name: Grid music experiment
description: An interactive grid of squares that gradually fade in and out on a canvas, responding to mouse movements. The square under the cursor is illuminated and neighboring squares are randomly added, with their opacity decreasing over time to create a dynamic visual effect.
